sourcesContent:
import './checkout-item.styles.scss' import { useContext } from 'react' import { CartContext } from '../../context/cart.context' const CheckoutItem = ({ cartItem }) => { const {clearItemFromCart,addItemToCart, removeItemToCart } =useContext(CartContext); const { name, imageUrl, price, quantity } = cartItem return (
{name} removeItemToCart(cartItem)}>{`<`} {quantity} addItemToCart(cartItem)}>{`>`} {price}
clearItemFromCart(cartItem)}>✕
) } export default CheckoutItem
